explains: v. 存在，实际上有；持续存在，生存
wordGroup: exist as 以…形式(或形态)存在，作为…而存在，
exist on 靠…生存；靠…生活

sentences.en: They can't exist on the money he's earning.
sentences.cn: 他们靠他挣的那点钱无法维持生活。

sentences.en: The magic cure for inflation does not exist.
sentences.cn: 解决通货膨胀的神奇方法并不存在。

sentences.en: Does life exist on other planets?
